required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Comparison of Advate rAHF-PFM With Recombinate rAHF in Patients With Severe Hemophilia A
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetic Comparison of Advate rAHF-PFM With Recombinate rAHF in Patients With Severe Hemophilia A: a Phase IV, Prospective, Randomized, Controlled, Cross-over, Single Center Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare the pharmacokinetic parameters and safety of Advate rAHF-PFM versus Recombinate rAHF in well described previously treated patients with severe hemophilia A (factor VIII level < 1%).

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) From 0 to 48 Hours. One-Stage Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (aPTT) -Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
primary_outcome.description: AUC estimated by linear trapezoidal method. The linear trapezoidal method is a numerical method used to approximate the area under a curve.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) From 0 to 48 Hours. Chromogenic Assay Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
primary_outcome.description: AUC estimated by linear trapezoidal method. The linear trapezoidal method is a numerical method used to approximate the area under a curve.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) From 0 to 48 Hours. FVIII One-Stage Clotting Assay (Bonn Method) Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
primary_outcome.description: AUC estimated by linear trapezoidal method. The linear trapezoidal method is a numerical method used to approximate the area under a curve.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) From 0 to 48 Hours. FVIII Clotting Assay. Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
primary_outcome.description: AUC estimated by linear trapezoidal method. The linear trapezoidal method is a numerical method used to approximate the area under a curve.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) From 0 to Infinity. One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: AUC estimated by linear trapezoidal method. The linear trapezoidal method is a numerical method used to approximate the area under a curve. FVIII activity measurement

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) From 0 to Infinity. Chromogenic Assay Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) From 0 to Infinity. FVIII Clotting Assay. Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: AUC estimated by linear trapezoidal method. The linear trapezoidal method is a numerical method used to approximate the area under a curve.

secondary_outcome.measure: Systemic Clearance (Cl). One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Systemic clearance in mL/kg/h will be calculated as the dose in IU/kg divided by the total area under the curve.

secondary_outcome.measure: Systemic Clearance (Cl). Chromogenic Assay Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Systemic clearance in mL/kg/h will be calculated as the dose in IU/kg divided by the total area under the curve.

secondary_outcome.measure: Systemic Clearance (Cl). FVIII One-Stage Clotting Assay (Bonn Method) Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Systemic clearance in mL/kg/h will be calculated as the dose in IU/kg divided by the total area under the curve.

secondary_outcome.measure: Systemic Clearance (Cl). FVIII Clotting Assay. Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Systemic clearance in mL/kg/h will be calculated as the dose in IU/kg divided by the total area under the curve.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Plasma Concentration (C-max). One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: C-max will be calculated as the maximum concentration following infusion of either Advate or Recombinate.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Plasma Concentration (C-max). Chromogenic Assay Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: C-max will be calculated as the maximum concentration following infusion of either Advate or Recombinate.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: C-max will be calculated as the maximum concentration following infusion of either Advate or Recombinate.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Plasma Concentration (C-max). FVIII Clotting Assay. Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: C-max will be calculated as the maximum concentration following infusion of either Advate or Recombinate.

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal Half-life. One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Computed from the terminal or disposition rate constant obtained from log-linear fitting using the least squares deviation to the last five quantifiable concentrations (9 to 48 hours).

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal Half-life. Chromogenic Assay Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Computed from the terminal or disposition rate constant obtained from log-linear fitting using the least squares deviation to the last five quantifiable concentrations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal Half-life. FVIII One-Stage Clotting Assay (Bonn Method) Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Computed from the terminal or disposition rate constant obtained from log-linear fitting using the least squares deviation to the last five quantifiable concentrations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal Half-life. FVIII Clotting Assay. Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Computed from the terminal or disposition rate constant obtained from log-linear fitting using the least squares deviation to the last five quantifiable concentrations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incremental Recovery. One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Increase in factor VIII concentration from pre- to post-infusion.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incremental Recovery. Chromogenic Assay Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Computed from the terminal or disposition rate constant obtained from log_e -linear fitting using the least squares deviation to the last five quantifiable concentrations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incremental Recovery. FVIII One-Stage Clotting Assay (Bonn Method) Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Increase in factor VIII concentration from pre- to post-infusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Incremental Recovery. FVIII Clotting Assay. Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Increase in factor VIII concentration from pre- to post-infusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Residence Time (MRT). One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: The MRT in hours will be calculated as total area under the moment curve divided by the total area under the curve.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Residence Time (MRT). Chromogenic Assay Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: The MRT in hours will be calculated as total area under the moment curve divided by the total area under the curve.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Residence Time (MRT). FVIII One-Stage Clotting Assay (Bonn Method) Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: The MRT in hours will be calculated as total area under the moment curve divided by the total area under the curve.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Residence Time (MRT). FVIII Clotting Assay. Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: The MRT in hours will be calculated as total area under the moment curve divided by the total area under the curve.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax). One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Tmax in hours was defined as the minimum time to reach Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax).

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax). Chromogenic Assay Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Tmax in hours was defined as the minimum time to reach Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax).

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax). FVIII One-Stage Clotting Assay (Bonn Method) Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Tmax in hours was defined as the minimum time to reach Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax).

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax). FVIII Clotting Assay. Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Tmax in hours was defined as the minimum time to reach Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax).

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of Distribution at Steady State (Vss). One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Computed as weight-adjusted Clearance * Mean Residence Time

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of Distribution at Steady State (Vss). Chromogenic Assay Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Computed as weight-adjusted Clearance (CL) * Mean Residence Time

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of Distribution at Steady State (Vss). FVIII One-Stage Clotting Assay (Bonn Method) Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Computed as weight-adjusted CL * Mean Residence Time

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of Distribution at Steady State (Vss). FVIII Clotting Assay. Performed at Local Laboratory (i.e., University of Bonn, the Study Site)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Computed as weight-adjusted CL * Mean Residence Time

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Signed informed consent obtained from participant or legally authorized representative
- 15-60 years old
- Factor VIII level < 1% as documented by previously measured factor VIII and genotyping
- Previously treated with factor VIII concentrate(s) for a minimum of at least 150 exposure days (as documented by the study site investigator) prior to study entry
- Observed decrease of efficacy by subject and/or treating physician after being switched from Recombinate rAHF to Advate rAHF-PFM
Exclusion Criteria:
- The participant has a detectable factor VIII inhibitor at screening, with a titer >= 0.4 Bethesda Unit (BU) (Nijmegen modification of the Bethesda Assay) measured at the local and the central laboratory
- The participant has a known hypersensitivity to mouse or hamster proteins
- The participant is participating in another investigational drug study within 30 days prior to screening
- The participant is identified by the investigator as being unable or unwilling to cooperate with study procedures

participant_flow.recruitment_details: 9 unique participants enrolled and treated at a single study site in Germany
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Participants required a factor VIII (FVIII) washout period ≥48 hours before receiving any pharmacokinetic (PK) infusions and could not be actively bleeding at the time of the infusion.

group.title: Advate rAHF-PFM Then Recombinate rAHF
group.description: First infusion - Advate Antihemophilic Factor (Recombinant)–Plasma/Albumin Free Method (rAHF-PFM): Infusion of 50 +/- 5 IU/kg bodyweight Second infusion - Recombinate Antihemophilic Factor (Recombinant) (rAHF): Infusion of 50 +/- 5 IU/kg bodyweight

group.title: Recombinate rAHF Then Advate rAHF-PFM
group.description: First infusion - Recombinate rAHF: Infusion of 50 +/- 5 IU/kg bodyweight Second infusion - Advate rAHF-PFM: Infusion of 50 +/- 5 IU/kg bodyweight

group.title: All Study Participants
group.description: Includes groups randomized to receive Advate rAHF-PFM and Recombinate rAHF first.

measure.title: Age

measure.description: C-max will be calculated as the maximum concentration following infusion of either Advate or Recombinate.

outcome.description: C-max will be calculated as the maximum concentration following infusion of either Advate or Recombinate.

outcome.title: Terminal Half-life. One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
outcome.description: Computed from the terminal or disposition rate constant obtained from log-linear fitting using the least squares deviation to the last five quantifiable concentrations (9 to 48 hours).

outcome.title: Mean Residence Time (MRT). One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)
outcome.description: The MRT in hours will be calculated as total area under the moment curve divided by the total area under the curve.
outcome.time_frame: 0-30 minutes before infusion up to 48 hours post-infusion

outcome.title: Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax). One-Stage aPTT-Based Assay Performed at Central Laboratory (Medical University Vienna)

group.title: All Study Participants
group.description: Includes groups randomized to receive Advate rAHF-PFM and Recombinate rAHF first.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Baxter requires a review of results communications (e.g., for confidential information and/or manuscript amendment proposals which do not negatively influence the scientific character of impartiality) ≥30 days prior to submission or communication. Baxter may request an additional delay of ≤60 days (e.g., for intellectual property protection)

point_of_contact.name_or_title: Brigitt Abbühl, MD, Medical Director, Hematology/Hemophilia
